scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--dns-result-order=ipv4first nodemon app/server.js --watch app --ext js
scripts.e2e: start-server-and-test "cross-env PORT=3000 npm start" http://localhost:3000 cypress:run
scripts.e2e:timestamp: start-server-and-test "cross-env PORT=3000 npm start" http://localhost:3000 cypress:run:timestamp
scripts.e2e:ci: start-server-and-test "cross-env MOCK_EXTERNAL=1 PORT=3000 npm start" http://localhost:3000 cypress:run
scripts.e2e:ci:timestamp: start-server-and-test "cross-env MOCK_EXTERNAL=1 PORT=3000 npm start" http://localhost:3000 cypress:run:timestamp
